name: Devil Trigger: Smash them all
description:
Devil Trigger is a dynamic 2d slasher about confronting hordes of demons.

What will you do if you come to the club to solve personal issues with the boss, and you are attacked by a crowd of demons? That's right, you'll grab a sword and smash them to the perfect rhythms of darksynth music in the neon light of the club!

Hold out as long as possible - Each new level will make it harder for you to stay alive.

Crush the demons in style - the better your combination, the higher Style you'll earn!

Customize your character - skins for the main character can be purchased in the store!

Expand your arsenal - in the store you will find new weapons that will expand your combinations to the incredible beauty of pirouettes!

Good luck!
